scripts.build:docs: cd docs && npm run build:web && npm run build:sales
scripts.heroku-postbuild: if [ "$APP_TYPE" = "api" ]; then cd packages/shared && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../../apps/api && npm install && npm run build; elif [ "$APP_TYPE" = "web" ]; then cd packages/shared && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../../apps/web && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --include=dev && npm run build; else echo 'APP_TYPE not set'; fi
